docs.title: OPDX Specification
docs.text: Welcome to the Open Profile Data Exchange (OPDX) specification!

docs.title: What is OPDX?
docs.text: OPDX is an open standard that allows email clients and services to retrieve profile metadata for email addresses securely.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• 🚀 Open & decentralized
  • 🔐 Privacy-focused
  • 🌎 Compatible with multiple providers

Get Started →
